title: Cant make a match
body:
me and 2 friends cant make a match for ranked 
1# from the 3rd try the game allowed me to make the lobby
2# they cant join the lobby and it gives them game critical error and after 3 relogs and 1 fix of the client still making the same problem
3# i couldnt start another lobby after i closed the last one and then i desided to come the the Boards

GG wp

replies.body: I'd like to help out but I need some more information here, such as details on this critical error.  What does it say exactly?  Does it have a bugsplat window?  When you and your friends join a queue together, the servers group you all together.  If someone has a poor network, they could get left behind.  If your friend is bugsplatting, though, there could be another issue entirely like corrupt game files.  Let me know!
